item.description:
Scoreboard has re-opened after a complete makeover!

Scoreboard looks AWESOME! I was there for the VIP Preview on Wednesday night. You have to go and check it out. Lui Tiant was there last night.

Re-Opening Party week continues on Friday night with Stanley Cup Champion Daniel Paille, Patriots Cheerleaders, Free Custom Scoreboard Give aways, A Cruise for two to the Bahamas, and live entertainment from Swerve. Also there will be a chance to take a ride in the Money machine to win cash prizes, red sox tickets provided by Absolute, and other must have prizes provided by Kiss 108 and Romeo himself.

More info is on Facebook too.  

Watch the Red Sox vs White Sox road game that starts at 8:10pm.

Ask for Lauren and the Red Sox Natives table.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask For Lauren and The Red Sox Natives or E Mail Other RSVPs to coordinate
item.name: Grand Re-Opening Party at ScoreBoard with Bruins Daniel Paille & Watch Sox Game
